title: Personal Photography Portfolio
paragraph: A high-intensity program where I have participated as a full-stack developer working with React.js and Java. With great effort and Agile methodology, in one month, our team has managed to create a fully-functional application for online-schooling to make studying and teaching easier at home during the pandemic.
